website_summaries.verdict: If you were looking for an essential oil product, this spray does a nice job and is easy to use.
pros: Works on feet to make them feel softer, too
Helps to keep your feet healthy
Can be used on sandals and flip flops
Can be sprayed directly onto feet or onto shoes
cons: This product will feel tingly on your skin, which some people like but others do not

customer_reviews.title: you'll understand how bad the whole room smells
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! My son's feet would gag us every time he took his shoes off. Especially in close quarters! I washed his shoes then had him spray his feet and the shoe. It was miraculous. We can actually be in the same room with him now! I spray his wrestling shoes a couple time per week. If you have ever experienced the wrestling room at a high school, you'll understand how bad the whole room smells. It smells like ass! Imagine the shoes after practice! This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: VM+3

customer_reviews.title: Holy Moly!
customer_reviews.text: I am plagued by stink feet, not matter what I do. I spray the top and bottom of each foot and rub on. I then spray each shoe once and put on. My feet are amazing at the end of the day. Now if you're starting with a pair of shoes already tainted with your foot fragrance, it is still a dramatic improvement. However, once I got new shoes add started fresh, holy moly amazing. I'm just got my 2nd bottle. 1st one more than 90 days, so for the price versus the life of the product, deserves another holy moly! I am so happy I pulled the trigger and tried this product. Thanks for knocking it out the park!
customer_reviews.author: Pat S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product did not help elimate the shoe odor, it only covers over the odor and the odor remainder, even after thoroughly dried. The product is also not returnable. I will use this product as a bathroom spray to use it up.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Not an foot/shoe spray
customer_reviews.text: Okay.. the description on this is WILDLY incorrect. It might be changed by the time you are reading this review. I purchased something called ‘elite sportz shoe deodorizer and foot spray’ This is 100% a foot massage oil. You can not spray this on our feet and walk away, you will slip and fall. Got some on my hardwood floor and it’s impossible to wipe up. Do NOT spray this in your shoe. I doesn’t dry and just leaves an oily mess. Smells real nice though...
customer_reviews.author: DanielParker

customer_reviews.title: Makes my sticky feet smell like peppermint now
customer_reviews.text: Makes my sticky feet smell like peppermint now. Seems like the more you sweat the more the natural oils kick in to combat odor. On my 3rd bottle and have been using it for over a year now. Directions say to us a pump or two but that was not enough for me as I am on my feet 12-14 hours a day. Best product I have been able to find for sticky/sweaty feet! Will be buying again and again lol.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Burns!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely couldn't use it on the top of my feet, otherwise they would burn for about thirty minutes afterward. The spray is so strong that if, after rubbing it into my feet, I touch anywhere near my face without washing my hands, my eyes start watering. I'd almost be willing to deal with it if it worked really well, but I'd give it about a "C" for effectiveness. Going to throw the rest of the bottle away.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yost

customer_reviews.title: Smell nice. Unfortunately it doesn't really work for me
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. Smell nice. Unfortunately it doesn't really work for me. Maybe I just really have stinky feet. In my shoes about 12 to 14 hours a day and my feet can really get sweaty and smelly. The product smell great but my feet still smell at the end of the day. I will still use it for now until it is gone. I wouldn't buy it again since it didn't work for me but hopefully it will for others.
customer_reviews.author: Urushiol

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it worked so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how good this stuff works. My boyfriend has always had outside jobs or is always doing something outside and when his shoes and flip flops get wet that smell is the WORST. Can stink up an entire living room. I really didn't think this product could help as good as all the reviews said it could but it seems most of the other reviews were in the exact same boat as me. A girlfriend tired of her boyfriends smelly shoes and feet lol. So we decided to try it and I'm so thankful we did!!!! This stuff works miracles. No more stinky feet and shoes. Still cant believe it worked so good.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived I thought 'oh great, another mint scented shoe spray that lasts 30 seconds,' but I've been pleasantly surprised. This pump spray is the only thing I've tried so far that not only covers smelly shoe aroma but actually prevents it. Due to past experiences, I'm possibly spraying more often than necessary (every 2-3 days) but it is keeping foul-shoe smell from filling the house. On top of that, I'm not seeing any ingredients I should be concerned with. Yeah, I'll be buying more of this.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This spray is wonderful. The mint is very cooling on my always ...
customer_reviews.text: This spray is wonderful. The mint is very cooling on my always warm feet and the smell is wonderful. Since I work out it's always refreshing in my running shoes. I would definitely order this again and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Corsair

customer_reviews.title: Helps quite a bit!
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product, it helps quite a bit, however, I was expecting a miracle. My feet sweat a LOT and wow, my shoes are just sometimes disgusting. Unfortunately, when you mix this with the smell of already stinky shoe, it doesn't fix that. This has definitely helped but it is winter time and that helps too. I look forward to it working in the summertime too. I wish it would also fix my shoes that already have been plagued with stinky-ness. I will continue to use this and perhaps buy more. I am also now seeking a fix for my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tolley

customer_reviews.title: Match description
customer_reviews.text: Oommmggggg!!! So my boyfriend's feet smells soooooooo bad to the point where even the floor that comes in contact with his feet would smell. The moment he steps through the door he has to go to the bathroom to scrub his feet and even after, his feet would still smell a little. Nothing seemed to work so I did some research and found this product and oommmggggg. IT WORKED after 1 use. It's as if he didn't have smelly feet to begin with. He still doesn't wear socks and his feet sweats but now the odour is under control.
customer_reviews.author: Sounie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan of this odor remover. First off, it makes your feet burn for most of the day, almost feeling like muscle rub. Also, you need to rub it on, which means your hands now also burn and it is hard to wash the stuff off. Most importantly, after a full day, the spray odor just mixed with my foot odor and created a nasty smell that didn't solve my problem. Lately, I have been having success with Gold Bond's foot spray (powder).
customer_reviews.author: Matt W

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've had a problem with my shoes, especially my work shoes (office setting) smelling terribly for a while. Combo of sweaty feet and poor insulation I guess. This spray has been working well to alleviate (but not entirely erase) the issue. The combination of the tea tree and peppermint oil is great at busting through those bad smelling bacteria. I spray in my shoes then one spritz on each of my feet. Hope you like the smell though as it is very strong. Still, works well for what I need and I definitely notice a difference when I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Miz P.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you wear sandals
customer_reviews.text: Product works! Extremely well! But - be careful if you wear sandals. I live in a very warm climate and work out of a home office and so the only time I'm in a closed toe shoe is when I'm in the gym. All other times it's bare feet or sandals. And with sandals, too much of this product turns them into an ice skating rink. If this is you, be careful to not use too much. One squirt at the bottom of your toes, one at the top... and then massage into the whole bed of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a problem with stinky feet for the past 8 months. I've tried aerosol spray, powder, apple cider vinegar, and a cream. Nothing worked. My family and boyfriend can't stand it. The other day I did a little homework to see what Amazon had so I wouldn't have to go to a doctor. I came across this spray and after I saw the reviews I gave it a shot. I sprayed all of my shoes. Yes it's only one day but the smell is gone! I wanted to put in the good feedback! Will update in a week and then a month to see if it has the same effect.
customer_reviews.author: Alana D

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye stinky feet!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...just when I thought it would never be safe to breathe in my house again, I found this! I love my daughter to death but her feet were killing me! Every time she took off her sneakers, boots or shoes...Yikes!! Since she’s been using this spray every day in her shoes and on her socks...we have no more issues with stinky feet! I can not recommend it highly enough! We even took it with us on vacation...don’t leave home with your feet without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy VanPelt

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed and I was skeptical.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this spray for 4 days now and it works wonderfully. I was pretty skeptical of this product and I really didn’t think it would work well if at all, but I have it a shot...Turns out that it works better than I could’ve imagined. It has proven to keep foot odor away for more than 24 hours. The first few times I used it I felt a very strong cooling sensation after I applied It for the first hour or two. It kind of feels like icy hot or mentholated ointment. However, I am happy with the product and will likely buy more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Spray was broken
customer_reviews.text: Spray did not work so well and was broken. Unfortunately this item is not returnable but amazon customer service was awesome and refunded me. I twisted the cap open and the smell was lovely but overpowering. Not sure if I want that strong smell in my shoes all day.
customer_reviews.author: Just a customer

customer_reviews.title: So Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this b/c I wear flats everyday and I noticed they were getting really smelly, this product is simply wonderful, it doesn't mask the smell itself but totally kills it. I didn't give a 5 star rating b/c my only complaint is that after applying directly on my feet as it stated on the directions, my feet were tingly like almost bothering me cause they felt like they were burning a bit, now I only apply every other day and only 2 sprays. I do apply in the shoe overnight rather directly on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Very good mix of essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Very good mix of essential oils . However, because they are essential oils, I was able to spray only the one time. From then on I can't use the spray. this morning I had to pour some on a tissue and wipe the inside of my shoes I really want this spray to work. Help! the spray tube and psst thing get clogged. fix it and this is an awesome product
customer_reviews.author: brendep

customer_reviews.title: Cool peppermint feet
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I was skeptical at first but I can take off my shoes and not feel self conscious about my stinky feet. I spray it on my feet at night and put socks on. I don’t have the patience or time to let it dry so I put socks on right away. And sometimes in the morning I’ll spray them after the shower and put socks on while I’m getting ready. I crisscross my legs when I do my makeup, so the essential oils get on my thigh and tingles a little, but not for long. Your feet will feel like cool peppermint. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a GEL/OIL - even tho it sprays on. Just not for me - it gunked up my leather suede foot liners of my Ecco sandals. I just received a new product that is more like a water spray-on - and it does a BETTER job on foot odor and doesn't goop up the inside of my shoes. PINPOXE Beauty - Athlete foot spray..... Although I don't have a fungal problem - it obliterates bacteria which was causing my foot odor.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Which is great for me and very bad for everyone else
customer_reviews.text: Come summer time I am always in sandals. Which is great for me and very bad for everyone else. Much like Pumba I found myself spending more time alone do to ones odor. However, unlike Pumba I have the power of the internet and discovered his wonderful product. I spray my shoes when I put them on and when I take them off and my feet are a tolerable dare I say pleasent smell. Now my family stays in the living room when I come to watch movies. Which is a big plus. I'd recommend this product to my friends 100% because now they'll get close enough to talk to them..
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really love this product. But it fell short of expectations. I tried it out for about a month, and still did not see... smell? results. I applied it every morning, but still 2 hours later, there was still an odor. I even bought new shoes so I could be positive it wasn’t just the shoes that were causing the issue. I wish it had worked( boy do I wish it worked). Overall, unhappy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is amazing and has changed our lives! My husband’s shoes smelled so bad after a day at work that I was making him leave them outside. I happened across this spray and figured it couldn’t hurt. It is amazing!! His feet and shoes don’t have the strong smell after working all day. He said it makes his feet feel fresh and tingly (the peppermint in the spray) for longer than he expected. I just ordered my 2nd bottle. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW, SAVE YOUR NOSE!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is miraculous. I was skeptical that it could help my husband's foot stench, after he would bartend for just one shift his feet could gag you from 10 feet away. The other day he worked a double, being in his shoes for 13 hours, and when he got home still no stench in the air. This is with the same pair of shoes that stunk to high heaven before, I'm sure once he gets a new pair it will be even better. Also I like that this stuff is natural and helps moisturize the feet, we used some expensive chemical shoe spray before and it made me uneasy, and didn't even work!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beurkens

customer_reviews.title: Bummer product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended but I found it super weird... it’s literally oil that you’re spraying on your feet. I felt like I had stepped in a frying pan, walking around all day with oil between my toes. So weird. It smelled nice, but I also don’t know that it was even effective. Tried to like it, and ran past the return date... otherwise, that’s probably what I would have done.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Works for problem with foot odor, but peppermint is too strong.
customer_reviews.text: This works, but didn’t like the extreme tingly feeling on my skin, almost like a burning sensation. Had to make sure not to touch any part of my face, especially my eyes, because the product stays on your hands even if you wash it with soap. So I quit using my hand to massage the product all over my feet. I’d spray both feet, then rub my feet together until it’s completely absorbed. It also has a distinct smell, with the peppermint, that’s too strong for me. Overall, it does work. At the end of the day, after wearing shoes all day, my feet & socks were ordor free, no stinky smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I spend 12 hrs a day in work boots, so yeah stuff smells. After the entire bottle used exactly like the manufacturer says, the smell isn’t any better. And when you spray it the smell is VERY strong. Stick with tinactin, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Nurse approved! Best product ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST product EVER! I am a nurse, I work 12+ hour shifts wearing compression socks & wear nursing shoes that have that plastic-type outside so there is NO airflow through my shoes at all. When I remove my work shoes my sweaty feet would smell horrible (never have had & still don’t have issues with smelly feet other than at work). I started using this product and after the VERY FIRST use there was NO bad smell anymore. This product is amazing and I will use it for the rest of my nursing career without a doubt! This product does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mata

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work try something else
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't help me at all so nothing to like about it unless you like oily feet
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Left a strange film inside my shoes
customer_reviews.text: I used this spray on my Tom's classics and it left a weird film on the inside of the shoes. After using if my feet sweat even a little it makes them slimy when it mixes with the film. I thought maybe it was a fluke so I tried it in a pair of work heels which didn't smell much and it did the same thing. Very strange, would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I am really truly impressed with this spray. My husband's stinky feet permeated the entire house. It was all we could smell. This spray actually helped his feet to heal; and now when I walk into the house, the whole place smells minty and fresh. I am very sensitive to smells, and to my delight I actually enjoy the smell of this spray. But what I like best is that it is made with all natural ingredients and essential oils instead of chemicals and artificial scents. My husband now uses it regularly. And the seller is a family run company that seems to take great pride in providing a quality product and excellent customer service. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LC Hall

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: So I’m giving a 3star rating but giving 5 stars to the scent, freshness and longevity. Reason being.... it does smell great! Love peppermint. And it’s smells fresh. However... it didn’t cover the scent very long. What DID last though... was for 2 days, if my boots got wet (which happens daily) my feet would get that peppermint burn and it was so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Traci D.

customer_reviews.title: This works like no other products we've tried!!
customer_reviews.text: My son had the WORSE smelling feet! We tried everything. Going anywhere with him was horrible because of the stench of his feet! Researched on Amazon and for some reason, this product stood out. Ordered it, got it fast, thank goodness and his feet have not smelled since! Just reordered more for him and my granddaughter. Saying I highly recommend is an understatement. This stuff worked a miracle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler stinky feet
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 100 stars I would. My 2 year old daughter had stinky feet. She sweats alot in her feet and I didn't want the kids making fun of her stinky feet in daycare. So happy I found this. We've been using this about 3 months now and it works well. Everyday I spray once in both shoes and once inside her socks, no smell when she gets home Even if I forget to spray one day, still no smell when she gets home. Because her shoes still has a fresh scent. Works very well!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsKayC

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this but it actually works. I am on my feet all day and I pretty much wear the same pair of shoes every day. I live in SC and it’s already hot here. I sprayed it on my feet this morning around 6 am and I just checked my feet (1:15 pm) and they just smell minty. I sprayed my feet again just because I already had my shoes off but I don’t know if it was even necessary.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Super oily!
customer_reviews.text: This spray does not help with foot sweat! The spray is so oily your feet will slip and slide all day. Which caused blisters! The spray smells nice, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: sean k.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skeptic of anything claiming to work that is all natural. But this product works better than any other product I have used over the years. You know that funky smell flip flops get by the middle of summer? That never happened this year. I spray my feet after my shower and let it dry a minute. I have also sprayed it onto my flip flops and in other shoes. It takes a long time to dry on plastic or rubber- but whatever odor was remaining was permanently gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackiejill

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to smell his feet anymore 😀
customer_reviews.text: My husband works just about 30 days a month and his feet smell so bad even after he gets out of the shower and scrub some down I can lay in bed and still smell feet this elite foot spray has done wonders it's a very minty smell so I suggest not to use a lot very convenient bottle definitely going to buy some more I finally found something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Love

customer_reviews.title: Nasty feet?
customer_reviews.text: I just wrote a review about another foot/shoe smell neutralizer. This smells really good. Not quite strong enough for my husband’s Olive Garden scented socks. Actually it’s worse. I’ve thought about leaving my whole family because it’s so bad. Love him but not his feet!!! Even my 2 year old talks about daddy’s nasty feet!
customer_reviews.author: Munday

customer_reviews.title: No match for Sketcher’s stink😞
customer_reviews.text: I like how this product makes my feet feel. It makes your feet tingly for about 15 minutes. I think it probably eliminates normal foot odor, but I bought it to help with my stinky Sketcher sandals. I washed my sandals and used this spray. It is no match for the horrific stench that emits from all Sketchers shoes with memory foam. I’m sure it will work for my other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Treat your stinking feet
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well; however, I treated my feet first. If you soak your feet in a tub of warm to hot water with 1/3rd cup of Epsom salt for 15 minutes, it helps. Quickly follow that up by soaking your feet in 1/2 warm water and 1/2 vinegar for 20 minutes it will prep your feet for a month or more. Then, massage this oil in your feet every morning after your shower. Your feet will feel amazing all day. One more tip. Wash your stinking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ohmstede

customer_reviews.title: Ho-hum useless product
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. The smell is overpowering and strange and it simply doesn’t work. Save your money and buy something from Dr. Scholl’s or anywhere else. The one upside is that the mintiness did make my feet at least feel cool but WARNING do not apply this product before putting on shoes and walking because the coolness from the mint + friction will quickly turn into a very strong burning sensation.
customer_reviews.author: sheila begin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me . It made shoes and feet smell overwhelmingly like peppermint and it did not dissapate quickly in addition I could still smell the dirty shoe smell through the overwhelming peppermint smell, it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Minty Fresh
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot spray I have ever purchased. When I wear flats without socks I have really bad foot odor, if I use this in the morning before I put my shoes on it helps to combat the foot odor. It leaves my feet feeling tingly, cool, and fresh. This is by no means a miracle spray it does not get rid of the foot odor but I feel that it does help to keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Great for sweaty feet!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from hyperhidrosis, a condition where my feet and hands sweat excessively regardless of the surrounding temperature. I found this gem on amazon and I can remove my shoes with ease when I go visit my friends and family and avoid the awkward stench from prolonged times of enclosed feet. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: SujD

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the effort for me to review because it is THAT GOOD! I moved to Florida and my feet started to stink. I was very embarrassed about it and wanted to fix the problem ASAP before my boyfriend moved in with me. This spray moisturizes my feet while fighting odor. My feet never stink now and it is because I use this once a day. It does make the floor sparkle a bit where I spray my feet so I’d be careful of that but otherwise this product is LIFE-CHANGING!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Wagster

customer_reviews.title: Product that works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I had issues with my work boots beginning to stink. I have to wear black cotton socks when I work and this, for whatever reason, began to make my feet smell. So I tried out this product. I usually spray my feet right before I leave and run the product in. Not only did it immediately eliminate the odor, but if also leaves my boots smelling peppermint fresh and feet cool. Recommend anyone with this issue to give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My husband works 12 hour shifts and wears steel toed ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband works 12 hour shifts and wears steel toed boots. His feet are rancid after a 12 hour shift. He keeps his boots on the back porch and the moment you go out there you can smell his boots. I no longer smell his boots or his sweaty socks when he takes his boots off. If you’re worried about strong mint scent, I can’t smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this spray for 2 months now and it's by far the best one I tried. I've used all those over the counter Athlete's Foot sprays and even tried a natural one before this one and some are messy and need to be used multiple times a day to be effective. This spray smells good, doesn't leave my foot dry or all white with powder, and i don't need to use it so often. I only use it 2-3 times a week and I have not had foot odor since I've been using it. I cleaned all my shoes when i first received it and no smells yet. I'm sticking with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: This product does exactly what it advertised
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! This spray has changed my life! Before my 15 yr old son would get into the car after a day at school with shoes that smelled so bad it would knock me out. A couple of sprays everyday has changed everything. I did wash shoes before we started using but he is wearing the same shoes and now no stink. The spray has a light peppermint scent that is refreshing and not overwhelming. I will be purchasing this item again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: great for freshening up stinky tennis shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to freshen up my son's stinky tennis shoes. I've bought other products from the store (like febreze) but my son hates the scents they provide, way too floral or girly scented. This product is just a fresh peppermint/eucalyptus smell and much better for him. I like it so much that I spray it in my shoes too!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT AROUND FOR FOOT ODOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE BEST FOOT/SHOE ODOR FIGHTER!! I spray in my shoes and directly on my feet! I have always loved wear slip on shoes or tennis shoes without socks and this helps with the sweat and odor. There is a slight tingle sensation when used directly on your feet but i actually like that. Refreshing!! Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B

customer_reviews.title: Stink no more!
customer_reviews.text: Embarrassingly I sweat bad. The older I’ve gotten,the worse it’s been. I’ve used everything out there and so far,this is the best! My feet aren’t as smelly, this stuff keeps them super soft and I’m not continuously embarrassed. I’m on my feet all day. I will be buying more! I highly recommend this product! Might want to wear gloves when applying.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! As a kid I used to have really smelly feet, but eventually grew out of it. Well, about a week ago I noticed that my feet had really stated to smell again. I purchased this spray and it is amazing! I am able to use it very sparingly due to the fact that it is very strong. I am very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah

customer_reviews.title: Landscaper game changer
customer_reviews.text: Stinky and itchy feet no more. Husband doesn’t landscaping so his feet not only sweat but also steps through some unsavory grass. This little bit of spray on his feet has been a game changer. He applies after shower and before he goes to work for added measure.
customer_reviews.author: T M

customer_reviews.title: Happy verified customer
customer_reviews.text: Great product I brought after reading several positive reviews. My husband has 2 full time jobs and is constantly on his feet this product helped tremendously with his foot odor. My teenage boys have been using it too and their room smells so much better. 🙏🏾😁
customer_reviews.author: Danae P

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help control odor, but does help soothe foot and ankle pain
customer_reviews.text: This made my feet smell better for just a little while, but didn't last for any length of time, and didn't make a dent in my stinky shoes (but my feet sweat in sandals so I think they're really bad). HOWEVER, after 12 hour shifts standing on concrete floors, it did help soothe the pain in my feet and ankles when my girlfriend sprayed it and massaged it into my feet so I think it's worth it for that alone! Warning though, two of our 7-month old kittens want to swat and attack my feet after they've been sprayed, and the other kitten wants to lick them non-stop (and the blanket if any gets on it)!
customer_reviews.author: Josh A

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a product that works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foot spray in self-defense, as my son and his basketball teammates often change shoes in my van. Believe me, I could tell when a kid has removed his shoes after practice! The other team moms and I have tried many other sprays and powders, but Elite Foot Spray is far and away the best at preventing odor and can even bring back a pair of shoes we were ready to throw out. Use of this product has made carpool MUCH more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: J in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great way to rid feet of odor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second option for freshening my shoes and feet. This thing works well- it's great to spray on your feet and helps get rid of bad odor. Massaging your feet works well, too. The scent is a bit potent, but nowhere near as strong as other products might be. It's a nice aroma but may be too much for some. I highly recommend this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great, Longlasting Product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am very impressed with this product. I was having an issue where no matter what sock or shoe I used, I had a very bad foot odor. This spray has a very pleasant scent, something like a minty mouthwash, and I have noticed a huge change in the odor of my tennis shoes. I spray it in my shoes once a day and it does the trick. very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Brock

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Reduced the smell from my powerfully stinky ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Reduced the smell from my powerfully stinky climbing shoes to a very manageable level. They were BAD. I don't think any product would be able to completely remove the smell to be honest. This did an admirable job. Just 2 or 3 sprays after every use and it doesn't smell like a horrible locker room when i get within 10 feet of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: speed6

customer_reviews.title: Try using this with hibiclens.
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well in reducing foot odor but what I find really helpful is using it for my shoes and washing my feet twice a day with hibiclens which is a cleanser used in medical offices and surgical OR's. My son who is a doctor told me about this and it works very well. I got the wash on Amazon. It's germicidal and general on skin.
customer_reviews.author: tnydncr

customer_reviews.title: Works just like the say, but note it is just 4 oz.
customer_reviews.text: OK this stuff works as advertised. Have some sneakers that you can smell three rooms away, this will cure that. It lasts for about two weeks in a high moisture environment for shoes that are regularly worn. Longer if they are just in storage. The only reason I do not give it a 5 star rating is I was expecting there to be a much bigger bottle for the price and the pictures make you believe it is bigger than 4 oz. This is documented so same on me, but I still feel this should be at least double the volume for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good Smell
customer_reviews.text: This smells very fresh and minty. I hardly ever wear socks and my feet sweat in the summer especially. I don't know that it works like a deodorant. It does, at least, freshens up my shoes and feet. If I need to take my shoes off, they smell good if I used this in the AM.
customer_reviews.author: K Doman

customer_reviews.title: My foot stink combined with this spay makes my feet and shoes irresistible for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible smelling feet. If I wear my converse, I literally have wash my feet and put socks on when I get home and even then they still smell. I thought this spray would work but it doesnt. The only thing it did was make my cat go crazy and start sniffing licking the inside of my smelly shoes. Something about this spray mixed with my icky foot stink makes my cat go crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Emma B

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky feet!
customer_reviews.text: My kids feet smelled like raw sewer. After getting this spray that smell is gone for good! I put this on their feet every time they shower! Don't put too much or their feet will feel tingly. 2 squirts and rub it in good!
customer_reviews.author: Srdjan

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy how effective this is!! I personally don’t recommend it as a shoe spray, but rather as a foot spray. I didn’t find that it worked on shoes that were already smelly, but if I put it on my feet, THEY DONT STINK. It’s remarkable. I have never been able to take my shoes off anywhere (ie, bowling, pedicures, doctors offices, friends houses) and so this has literally changed my life. I put it on every morning and never worry. None of the shoes I’ve purchased since I began to use this smell at all. BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mannette

customer_reviews.title: Hey this actually works
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This product is so good this is going to be my second time ordering. It has lasted me a good 4 months of midian usages once everyday.... I bought this so I dont have to put powder on my feet. Its quick and easy and hey it actually works. When I dont put it on, my feet can start smelling real quick but some quick sprays do the job fast.
customer_reviews.author: Yoboihdez

customer_reviews.title: Akin clarifying antiaging anti odor.
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly natural and very effective as a deodorizer and after reading the ingredients this product can be used on the skin. Its hi.as anti aging ingredients, moisturizing, bacteria killing with antioxidants minerals and more. Highly recommend for all skin except if you're sensitive to essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Louie88

customer_reviews.title: Powerful scent
customer_reviews.text: Powerful peppermint scent . Actually makes your feet tingle. Scent is so strong I’m not sure if it deodorizes or just covers, but it certainly has dealt effectively with foot odor in multiple shoes and slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff feels amazing. I have planter hyperhydrosis ( especially, chronically sweaty feet) and my feet/shoes are very vulnerable to developing smell and bacteria. I've been using this product at the beginning of the day (with an anti-persperant,) and at the end of the day mostly for my own enjoyment and because it keeps my feet feeling cool. I have noticed a reduction in smell when I take off my shoes. I don't know if it's improving the feel of my feet yet, but as I said it feels good to put on and I don't have to worry about using it too much. The smell is a very pleasing peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: nettle bones

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt believe how well it worked
customer_reviews.text: Wow, my feet were sweaty and stinky and so were my sandals but this immediately fixed that. The mint smell is strong but smells so fresh that the strength of it isn't bad. I am now comfortable with taking off my sandals!!
customer_reviews.author: Lupo Family

customer_reviews.title: or directly on your feet and you’re good to go
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a foot odor spray that would actually help me, and this really did. I’m constantly on my feet at work, usually wearing flats, and my feet get sweaty, so I looked into some stuff, and I landed on this. You just spray a little into your shoes, or directly on your feet and you’re good to go. I was so satisfied with this product, I already ordered another one. I’ll definitely be buying from them again. If you’re looking for something to make your feet stop smelling, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Softer feet!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this because of odor for sneakers and work shoes worn without socks. It surved that purpose well. What I didn’t expect was the effect it had on my feet. I’d had a horrible crack and callous for years that I could never manage to get ride of. After using this stuff it’s gone! Not sure how long it took, maybe a couple weeks. I only used it a few times a week. What scraping and lotions couldn’t get rid of, this spray took care of rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jome

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: The scent is to strong for me and the cooling sensation is a little much as well. It works well for stinky feet but you have to use it every day. I stopped using it for a couple days and my feet were stinking again after work. I wear leather work boots all day so my feet get really hot and sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good and bad
customer_reviews.text: good because your feet smell fresh...bad because it burns like hell i got it for my kid but luckily i tried it on myself first so yeah my kid is not gonna use it it really stings bad most of the day it feels like when you had your feet on the snow and then sumerge them on very hot water
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Avila

customer_reviews.title: Wow, the mint smell was good and it felt good on my feet!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product works very good. It has a mint smell to it and it also works like essential oils where it also soothes your feet. It also helped my feet from being stinky from wearing my shoes all day. I recommend this product. I would buy it again. The strength of this is very strong so you can definently feel the minty feeling through your skin even after washing your hand or feet so be careful touching other body parts after using this lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sheng

customer_reviews.title: No help for work boots.
customer_reviews.text: I fallowed the instructions and this product failed me. In my experience it attempts to cover up boot odor and has no effect on fighting bacteria causing odors within the steel toe boots. This product just adds a strong herbal smell to the funkiness and it’s not a good thing. I would not recommend wasting your money on this product and it is ineligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Harcourt

customer_reviews.title: Super fresh! Like deodorant for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Think of this as deodorant for your feet. I can’t say whether it works or not since I haven’t used it long enough but it’s absolutely natural, you can smell the authentic essential oils in this. Super fresh! Been using it daily since arrival. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this spray along with the shoe spray for my daughter and let me tell you how happy we are. My daughter who is only 5 years old started to have disgusting, horrible, toxic fumes, massive smelly feet. She used it the day it came in the mail. She loves the minty smell. Her odor went away. She is very happy and now she wants everyone to smell her feet. She says she has happy feet. I think she was insecure about the smell but never said anything. We are customers for life.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: It's all fresh and nice when you apply and massage your feet, but after a full day on your shoes, it's just like nothing. Does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Marchezini

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and works
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my sweet daughter has really bad foot odor so I purchased this spray after reading the reviews. It smells very good and does its job of eliminating the foot odor. My daughter's complaint is that it makes her feet feel sticky after it is applied so she doesn't necessarily like to use it. However, from a person sitting in the room with her after she has removed her shoes I highly suggest it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kidbusymom

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, and boy did it deliver! I cannot remember the last time I was really wowed like this. I will order this product forever and recommend it to everyone that has any kind of food odor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Alexander

customer_reviews.title: does a good enough job
customer_reviews.text: The spray works good enough. Peppermint is what I smell the most. Your feet do have a tingle sensation at first. The odor is not completely eliminated but does well. The bottle so far has lasted longer than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo R

customer_reviews.title: Works reasonably well but sticky!
customer_reviews.text: This foot spray did help my kids with their stinky feet if applied every morning after cleaning their feet. However, this product is very sticky, and I wouldn't recommend using it without putting on socks afterwards, as I imagine it would leave a sticky residue on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jpevball9

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all, I was using another band that worked well. This spray makes your feet burn (like ice hot) and I think sweet and stink more. Horrible product I wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: By mike

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FOR FEET AND SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to help with my shoes getting that smell ! I think I have the worst feet and cant stand it. I have tried at least 50 different products and tried all home remedies. None of them work ! This is the only product that works. On top of everything else it leaves your feet very soft and smelling great !
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but the smell is kinda strong. I got this because I'm on my feet all day at work and when I get home my feet stink. Just a heads up TSA confiscated this at the airport. Apparently it's too big of a bottle 🤦‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Tiba

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product
customer_reviews.text: Wow this product works wonders! My boyfriend and I have both been using it for about a week. He does construction and wears work boots that don't breathe for 8 hours a day and his feet haven't smelled after work! He no longer has to quarantine his work boots outside of the house. My only complaint is that the spray bottle leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long/isn't strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell is nice but it simply doesn't work for long. In fact, I can still smell my feet after spraying. It's not as bad but I can't still identify it. It lasts about 2 hours. It feels nice because it tingles a little bit. So this is good for someone with mild odor I guess? It came quickly in the mail though.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great for stinky feet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a spray that you can use daily to keep your feet from smelling terrible throughout the day (like mine usually do). When you first apply it, you can feel a slight cooling effect from the essential oils and alcohol which is nice. Just make sure you always shake it every time, or else things settle and you don't have the same spray in a couple weeks since you've sprayed out more solvent.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that this is all natural, which is what I was looking for, but it sadly didn’t work for me. I sprayed it on my feet and in my shoes, but it just left a damp feeling. I do love the minty tea tree aroma though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: My feet sting!!!!! I don’t find them effective and whether i spray it on my feet or the shoe, my feet are on fire for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Warren

customer_reviews.title: Elite Foot Spray Really Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I am so ashamed to admit that I have stinky feet! But, I recently purchased the Elite Foot Spray, and am no longer ashamed to have stinky feet because now I do not! This stuff really works! It also seems to combat any dryness or rough patches on my feet. Try it, I do not think you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Nolan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands feet drive me crazy. The smell terrible, because they're constantly sweating in boots. This product is fantastic! Not only does it smell fantastic but it also feels amazing. He sprays it on his feet after showers at night and another quick spray before he puts his boots on in the morning. There is a huge difference!!!! I'm so happy that I purchased this product, and I will DEFINITELY be getting it again when we run out!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Despite playing sports in school, I have never really dealt with foot stank like I have this summer. I put this stuff directly on my feet every morning before I put my socks on and put a spray in my shoes at the end of the day, and I don't have to worry about stanky smelling shoes or feet. I've been using about 6 sprays per day for about a month, and the bottle is still 3/4 full. I have a bottle in my locker at the golf course too, so it's great for athletic shoes as well. The smell of this product is pleasant, but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG amazing actually it worked so well I stopped applying. Wore some closed toe shoes realized a slight odor not as bad as it used to be.. will continue to use feels and smells great!! A must try!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Elite Sportz Shoe Deodorizer and Foot Spray - No More Embarrassing Smelly Shoes or Stinky Feet with Our Very Popular Peppermint Foot Spray and Shoe Freshener - 4 OZ
feature_bullets: Our shoe deodorizer is not just a foot spray: it's also a moisturizer that goes to work controlling odors and promoting healthier feet
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA Our formulation includes 7 pure essential oils and 11 helpful herbs and botanicals.
Also specially designed to moisturize and repair dry cracked feet: you’ll also notice an icy sensation as it soothes hydrates and cools sore tired aching feet
We have sourced the highest quality natural ingredients available: no harsh chemicals: no aluminium: no parabens and 100% non toxic ingredients
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION – We stand by and believe in our products 100%! If you have any problems, contact us and we will offer you a full refund or replacement!
